<h2 id="实践">实践</h2>
<p>需要先在本地成功运行mcp_server_sqlite服务。</p>
<pre><code class="language-cmd">git clone https://github.com/modelcontextprotocol/servers.git
</code></pre>
<p>配置参考这个：</p>
<pre><code class="language-python">"mcpServers": {
  "sqlite": {
    "command": "uv",
    "args": [
      "--directory",
      "parent_of_servers_repo/servers/src/sqlite",
      "run",
      "mcp-server-sqlite",
      "--db-path",
      "~/test.db"
    ]
  }
}
</code></pre>
<p>本文使用的控制台程序代码在：<a href="https://github.com/Ming-jiayou/mcp_demo%E3%80%82" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://github.com/Ming-jiayou/mcp_demo。</a></p>
<p>配置文件中我是这样写的：</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3288240/202503/3288240-20250315162710898-1995894929.png" alt="image-20250315161341960" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>--directory后写这个脚本所在的文件夹，--db-path后写数据库所在的路径。</p>
<p>感兴趣快来玩玩玩吧！！</p>
